name: Hobo invasion
description:
Hobo invasion vas made for the Global Game Jam 2022, with the theme: Duality.

The game is a multiplayer game for 4-6 players. There are 3-5 hobos and one rich person. As a hobo your goal is to try to break into the mansion and kill the rich person.

As the rich person your goal is to survive and place traps around the house to kill the hobos, before they can kill you.

To join a room, make sure you type the same name/code as the person who created the room. There can only be a max of 20 people on the network at once.

The game is still in early development and thus the game is not yet completely plaayable. We will continue developing the project.

This game was made by:

Jack Hulspas - Developer

Gwen van der Woude - Developer

Cas Wijers- Artist
